snippet: Officials have said the “obvious suspicion” is that at least some of the apparent growth in gold shipments to Dubai is tied to illicit activities that have come to define Afghanistan’s economy.
abstract: Afghan and American officials are confounded by increasing regularity of roughly hewed bars of gold being flown out of Afghanistan, raising fears that money launderers have found new way to spirit funds from country; most of gold is being carried on commercial flights destined for Dubai, and is fully declared and legal to fly.
lead_paragraph: Officials have said the “obvious suspicion” is that at least some of the apparent growth in gold shipments to Dubai is tied to illicit activities that have come to define Afghanistan’s economy.

headline.seo: As Gold Is Spirited Out of Afghanistan, Officials Wonder Why
headline.main: An Afghan Mystery: Why Are Large Shipments of Gold Leaving the Country?
headline.print_headline: An Afghan Mystery: Why Are Large Shipments of Gold Leaving the Country?
